typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
AddAuditColumns sink(input(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string,
		insert_datetime as timestamp,
		update_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UID'],
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia,
		insert_datetime,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRow
